alert.note: Alert for South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Walton County through 400 PM CDT... At 300 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Niceville to 6 miles east of Santa Rosa Beach. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, Eglin Air Force Base, Villa Tasso, Port Washington, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Miramar Beach, Gulf Pines, Bunker, Grayton Beach, Seagrove Beach, Sandestin and Four Mile Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
